trans-unit.source: Continue
Your answer is correct.
You have already selected this AminoAcid. Click Reset to proceed.
Same capillary tube is used for more than one Amino Acid. Click Reset to proceed.
You have dropped different AminoAcids in the same paper slot. Click Reset to proceed.
1.Take one capillary tube.
2.Fill the capillary tube with amino acid.
3.Spot the amino acid on the TLC plate .(Do not use the same capillary tube for more than one solvent) and dry the spot .
4.Discard the capillary tube
5.Repeat the steps 1, 2, 3 & 4 with given amino acids.
6.Click the “continue” button.
7.Click on the lid to open the chamber.
8.Take the TLC plate and keep it in the TLC chamber containing the TLC solvent.
9.Click again on the lid to close the chamber and wait for the solvent to rise.
10.click the “continue” button.
11.Click on the lid to open the chamber
12.Move the TLC paper out of the chamber and place it on the table. Dry the TLC plate using blow dryer.
13.click the “continue” button.
14.Spray Ninhydrin reagent on the dried TLC plate by clicking the spraying bottle.
15.After spraying,dry the plates in air oven at 105°C for 5 min.
16.The colored spots will appear on the TLC plate at different levels.
17.Identify the unknown mixture by comparing it with the known amino acids.If the level of the unknown mixture is same as that of the known amino acids , then their characteristics matches.
Reset
Select the correct Amino Acid from the following options.
Click in any AminoAcid
Click on the drawn line
Click here to discard the capillary tube.
unknown
Your answer is wrong. Try again
